DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY OF INDIA ONE EARTH ONE FAMILY ONE FUTURE : 23 ,2023 Ref: IRDAI/HLT/ORD/Gen/73/03/2023 Dated: 23TMMarch,2023 ORDER Re: Expert committee for matters related to mental health One of the important areas that needs attention from the point of view of insurance coverage is mental health. A holistic examination of the various aspects involved such as types of conditions, types of treatments etc from the insurance perspective is necessary when dealing with products designed to cover mental illnesses and other related aspects. Therefore, it has been decided to constitute a committee of experts to advise IRDAI on matters related to mental health and insurance. Bl: A. The constitution of the Committee shall be as follows: 1) Dr.Pratima Murthy, Director, NIMHANS, Bangalore, Chair 2) Dr. Nimesh Desai, Former Director, Institute of Human Behaviour and Allied Sciences, New Delhi, Member 3) Dr.S.Kalyanasundaram, Practising Psychiatrist, Bangalore, Member 4) Mr. Bhargav Dasgupta,CEO, ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Ltd, Member 5) Mr.Mayank Bathwal, CEO, Aditya Birla Health Insurance Company Ltd, Member. . 115/1, -500 032, Survey No. 115/1, Financial District, Nanakramguda, Hyderabad-500 032, India : 91-40-20204000, : wwwairdai.gov.in : 91-40-20204000, Website : www.irdai.gov.in
B. The Terms of Reference of the Committee shall be as follows: 1) Expert advice on coverages offered/to be offered under insurance products, for mental illnesses 2) aa Expert advice/inputs on terminology, concept and the like on matters relating to mental illnesses from the medical domain perspective 3) Advice on various aspects relating to mental illnesses from the insurance domain perspective 4) Any other relevant aspect related to the subject matter of mental illness The Committee shall be in force for a period of two Wo the date of this order.
